charges.charge_disposition: CT: 1 Dft is placed on prob for a term of five (5) years under the following terms &; conditions: the dft 1) shall comply w/the rules &; regulations of the US Prob Office &; General Ord 318; 2) shall perform 3000 hours of comm service as directed &; appvd by the prob officer; shall serve 50 days in a jail-type institution in the custody of the BOP on consecutive week-ends commencing on 3/25/95 at 8:00am &; cont to 3/26/95 at 6:00pm &; cont every week-end thereafter until the 50 days have been served; shall appear bef the crt every 120 days as directed by the Prob Officer. Ord tht all fines are waived. Ord tht dft pay a special assessment of $25.00. Ord tht the bond of dft shall be exon upon completion of the 50 days of week-end incarceration in a jail-type facility (1)
